name: Disturbance in Sector C
description:
Your ship has been taken over by a virus, accidentally created by the government.  It is killing everyone on board; you must now survive...

A = Shoot Left

D = Shoot Right

Arrows = Move

Space = Jump

F = Fullscreen

R = Restart Level

P = Pause

When you buy these downloads, you will NOT receive the game.  You can download the demo for free, but it can only be run on a website.  It is to mod, or distribute on a website, not for offline play.  When you pay 0$ you will get:

  • The Soundtrack
  • The Player's Guide
  • The Art Book
